resources.string: Please grant this app the following permissions, as they are vital to its core functionalities.
This is used to display simple menus over your other apps, a convenient way to manage and configure this auto-clicker

This app uses the accessibility service solely to perform click gestures, an essential part of the auto-clicker. This will not be used to collect nor transmit your data. For more information, please see our privacy policy
This app uses the Media Projection API to detect pixel colors on your screen and click accordingly, one of this app\'s distinguishing features

Welcome! Let's get familiar with the home screen.
 1: Displays the overlay menu, allowing you to edit and run your auto-clicker
 2: Lets you manage your saved clicker layouts
 3: Configures this app's general settings

Once you click the power button, you'll see this overlay menu. Make sure to keep your phone in the same orientation while editing up your clickers and playing the auto-clicker, as this will keep your clicker positions aligned with the screen.
 1: Pauses and plays this app's auto-clicker
 2: Adds a new clicker you can freely drag around
 3: Removes the latest clicker
 4: Saves your clicker positions and their color detectors

If you tap on a clicker, you'll find this menu.
 1: Toggle the "pixel dipper". Tapping again will paste the tapped pixel's position and color in the fields to the right
 2: Adjust your color detector's settings, such as its pixel coordinates and target color
 3: Remove the selected color detector
 4: Add a new color detector
